title: Vegeta : Xeno & Trunks : Xeno
skills_text:
You can only play mono-black Battle Cards.
Draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less or you have 20 or more cards in your Drop Area : You may draw 1 card, switch up to 1 of your energy to Active Mode, add cards from your life to your hand until you have 6 cards in your life, and flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
You can only play mono-black Battle Cards.
(This skill takes effect when you have 20 or more cards in your Drop Area.) If you would lose the game by running out of cards in your deck, shuffle your Drop Area into your deck instead.
Draw 1 card, place 5 cards from the top of your deck in your Drop Area, then choose up to 1 of your black Unison Cards and it gains for the turn.

title: SS Gotenks, Fusion of Friendship
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a black 《Saiyan》 card : When this card is placed in your Drop Area from your deck by a skill and you don't have a Unison Card in play, you may play this card from your Drop Area with a marker on it.
Choose 1 card in your hand and discard it : This card gets +10000 power for the turn.
This card gets +20000 power and for the turn.

title: Time Agent Vegeta
skills_text:
(Only 1 copy of this card can be played in your Battle Area.)
If this card would be removed from your Battle Area, it's sent to its owner's Warp instead.
If your Leader Card is a black 《Saiyan》 card : When this card is placed in your Drop Area from your deck by a skill, you may play this card from your Drop Area.
: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 or less and send it to its owner's Warp.

title: Time Agent Trunks
skills_text:
(Only 1 copy of this card can be played in your Battle Area.)
(When one of your other cards is attacked, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
When this card is played, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.
If your Leader Card is a black 《Saiyan》 card : When this card is placed in your Drop Area from your deck by a skill, you may play this card from your Drop Area.

title: Supreme Kai of Time, Guardian of Spacetime
skills_text:
If you have 5 or less cards in your hand : When this card is used in a combo, this card gets +5000 combo power for the battle.
If your Leader Card is a black 《Saiyan》 card : When this card is placed in your Drop Area from your deck by a skill, you may play this card from your Drop Area.
